name: shortcode
description: Description: The name of the custom emoji.

name: url
description: Description: A link to the custom emoji.

name: static_url
description: Description: A link to a static copy of the custom emoji.

name: visible_in_picker
description: Description: Whether this Emoji should be visible in the picker or unlisted.

name: category
description: Description: Used for sorting custom emoji in the picker.
